Tesla to kick off Cybertruck's China tour in late Jan -mediaA China-wide tour showcasing Tesla's flagship Cybertruck pickup will kick off in late January, with eight trucks simultaneously on display in eight cities including Shanghai and the capital, Beijing, media outlet the Paper said on Tuesday. China regulator removes draft video game rules from website; shares jumpChina's gaming regulator has removed from its website rules it proposed last month aimed at curbing spending and rewards that encourage playing video games, checks by Reuters on Tuesday showed, in a move that boosted gaming company shares.
